TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersonalizableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PersonalizableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PersonalizableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示个性化特性。

span.span: Represents the personalization attribute.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 个性化设置特性`Personalizable`应用于需要保存个性化设置信息的公共控件属性。The personalization attribute, `Personalizable`, is applied to public control properties that need to persist personalization information. 当控件位于 Web 部件页上的 Web 部件区域中时, ASP.NET 会自动生成代码, 以在基础数据存储区中保留或检索这些值。ASP.NET automatically generates the code to persist or retrieve these values from the underlying data store when the control is in a Web Parts zone on a Web Parts page. 必须满足以下要求才能将属性标记为可个性化:The following requirements must be met for a property to be marked as personalizable: - 属性必须是公共的, 并且必须具有公共 get 和 set 访问器。The property must be public and must have public get and set accessors. - 属性必须是读/写属性。The property must be a read/write property. - 属性必须是不带参数的。The property must be without parameters. - 无法为属性编制索引。The property cannot be indexed. 系统会自动生成代码, 以便加载和保存属性的个性化数据。Code is automatically generated to load and save personalization data for properties. 根据属性是否存在此属性, 以及属性符合上面列出的约束这一事实来确定支持个性化的属性。Properties that support personalization are determined based on the existence of this attribute on the property and the fact that the property conforms to the constraints listed above. 请注意, 个性化设置不支持只读和只写属性。Note that read-only and write-only properties are not supported for personalization. 将此特性应用于只读或只写属性将导致引发。Applying this attribute to a read-only or write-only property results in an being thrown. 参数化属性也会引发异常。Parameterized properties also throw an exception. 如果未使用通过接口的特殊处理, 则不会从个性化设置中排除单独的属性。Individual properties without this attribute are excluded from personalization if no special handling through the interface is used. 有关使用属性的详细信息, 请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information about using attributes, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在代码中使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in code. 该示例包含一个 .aspx 页面, 该页面引用名`ColorSelector.ascx`为的 Web 部件用户控件。The sample consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Part user control called `ColorSelector.ascx`. 下面的代码是该示例的 .aspx 文件。The following code is the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的代码用于`ColorSelector.ascx`控件。The following code is for the `ColorSelector.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/ColorSelector.ascx#2)]

span.span: The property is a read-only or write-only public property.
-or-

span.span: The property is a private or protected read/write property.
-or-

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在内部将属性设置为布尔值参数的值 , 属性设置为, 并将属性`false`设置为。This constructor internally sets the property to the value of the Boolean parameter, the property to , and the property to `false`. 如果你希望派生类型将可在基类型上个性化的虚拟属性标记为在派生类型上不可个性化的虚拟属性, 则此构造函数很有用。This constructor is useful if you want a derived type to mark a virtual property that is personalizable on the base type as not-personalizable on the derived type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ICollection GetPersonalizableProperties(class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: type
param.span: 要在其上查找 属性的类型。

span.span: The type on which to look for properties.

summary.span: 返回特定属性的 对象的集合，这些属性与此参数类型匹配并标记为可个性化。

span.span: Returns a collection of objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.
An of personalizable properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个包含零个或多个对象的集合, 该集合中的每个对象都被标记为可个性化, 其中等于`true`。This method returns a collection containing zero or more objects, with one object in the collection for each property of the type specified that is marked as being personalizable, where equals `true`. 参数是要在其上`Personalizable`查找属性的类型。 `type`The `type` parameter is the type on which to look for `Personalizable` properties. 例如, 你将传入`"typeof(MyWebPart)"`以`Personalizable`获取`MyWebPart`类的属性。For example, you would pass in `"typeof(MyWebPart)"` to get the `Personalizable` properties on the `MyWebPart` class.

exception.span: 该类型上的公共属性被标记为可个性化，但为只读的。

span.span: A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值在创建类的实例时设置。This value is set when an instance of the class is created. 此属性控制如何导出属性值。This property controls how the property value is exported. 如果将属性设置为`true`, 则当控件的属性设置为时, 不会导出该属性。If the property is set to `true`, it will not be exported when the control's property is set to .
